Description.Text: Featuring the FOX fitted long sleeved collared shirt with a sophisticated workwear look and feel. Constructed from high quality twill, this camo printed shirt include classic flap chest pockets with twill tape detail, branded buttons, a concealed button stand and antique silver side zips. The garment is put through a softening silicone wash to ensure this shirt is smooth to the touch.

Featuring the PRECISION regular fit long sleeved collared shirt with a luxuriously soft handle and drape. This shirt is constructed from high quality 100% Tencel fabric. The finer details include classic flap chest pockets, branded buttons and a woven tonal hem label. The garment is finished off with a silicone wash to ensure this shirt is soft to the touch.

The CANNON regular fit long sleeved collared shirt is constructed from high quality cotton fabric. This chambray shirt features a tonal left chest embroidery, branded buttons and a contrast woven hem label. The garment is put through a softening silicone wash to ensure this shirt is soft to the touch. This shirt is ideal for cool summer evenings.

Featuring the FOX fitted long sleeved collared shirt with a sophisticated workwear look and feel. Constructed from high quality twill, the finer details include classic flap chest pockets with twill tape detail, branded buttons, a concealed button stand, antique silver side zips and a constrast woven hem label. The garment is put through a softening silicone wash to ensure this shirt is smooth to the touch.

The CHAIN long sleeved regular fit shirt is designed with a red and navy check pattern. The check shirt has a concealed left chest welt pocket with easy access and finished off with an SP clip label and branded buttons. Branded buttons finish off the collar tips, button stand and cuffs. A dirty wash effect helps to finish off this check shirt, as well as a woven hem label.

Featuring the FOX fitted long sleeved collared shirt with a sophisticated workwear look and feel. Constructed from high quality twill, the finer details include classic flap chest pockets with twill tape detail, branded buttons, a concealed button stand, antique silver side zips and a constrast woven hem label. The garment is put through a softening silicone wash to ensure this shirt is smooth to the touch.

Featuring the PRECISION regular fit long sleeved collared shirt with a luxuriously soft handle and drape. This shirt is constructed from high quality 100% Tencel fabric. The finer details include classic flap chest pockets, branded buttons and a woven tonal hem label. The garment is finished off with a silicone wash to ensure this shirt is soft to the touch.

Featuring the BRAVO lightweight stretch poplin long sleeve shirt. Crafted 100% premium cotton yarn in a classic silhouette, this is a must have basic that serves as a good hybrid between work and play. The shirt features button up front, a narrow collar, left chest chevron and S.P.C.C bottom placket embroidery. This shirt has been finished with a silicone and heavy enzyme wash for extra softness and comfort.

Featuring the QUEBEC short sleeve denim shirt. This shirt is crafted from lightweight denim and constructed in a regular fit. Shirt features a button up front, left chest pockets with S.P.C.C winder and a pointed back collar. The garment has been carefully treated with a heavy enzyme wash for a genuine vintage look. Quebec has been finished with a silicone wash for extra softness and comfort.

Featuring the CASE denim shirt crafted from lightweight denim and constructed in a regular fit. Shirt features long sleeves, button up front, raw edged hem and front chest pockets. The garment has been carefully treated with a vintage bleach wash. Finer details include branded matte black press studs and S.P.C.C bottom placket embroidery. This shirt has been finished with a silicone and heavy enzyme wash for extra softness and comfort.

Featuring the YANKEE lightweight stretch poplin long sleeve shirt. Crafted 100% premium yarn dyed cotton in a tartan weave. This shirt emboses a classic silhouette. Shirt features button up front, a narrow collar, left chest chevron, S.P.C.C bottom placket embroidery and SP clip on left chest pocket. The Yankee shirt has been finished with a silicone and heavy enzyme wash for extra softness and comfort.

Featuring the QUEBEC short sleeve denim shirt crafted from lightweight denim. This denim shirt has been constructed in a regular fit and features a button up front, left chest pocket with S.P.C.C winder and a pointed back collar. It has been carefully treated with a heavy enzyme wash for a genuine vintage look. Quebec denim shirt has been finished with a silicone wash for extra softness and comfort.
